intro: Berrebera, commonly known as the African nightshade, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Solanaceae family, which includes other well-known plants like tomatoes and potatoes. The plant features small, white or purple flowers and produces berries that are typically toxic to humans and animals.
